snippet: Two contentious debates in the past weeks, the wrangling over Alstom and a row over the strength of the euro, underscored the breadth of the divide.
lead_paragraph: Two contentious debates in the past weeks, the wrangling over Alstom and a row over the strength of the euro, underscored the breadth of the divide.

headline.print_headline: An Awkward Show of French-German Unity
headline.main: An Awkward Show of French-German Unity
